title: LOL still got the worse COMMUNITY in the world !!!
body:
I just got back after years of not playing lol due to the fact that the community was so toxic back then, but here i am, playing 5 games since i back, and i did it every day this week, and still this community is the worse ever.

*players going afk rage because the jungle didn't help them once, or the jungle didn't get help so he refuse to ganke.

*players going afk because they cant play right now so why the hell u joining to game that matches take around 40-80 minutes ?

*players rage dc, then coming back to see that we still playing and didn't give up 4vs5 and he starting to get toxic and feed the enemy because he stuck on same match still.

*players still non stop offensive to everyone both sides, even if u mute them they just trolling your lane and feed the enemy.

I don't get you riot, as nothing changed yet ? 
you maybe the biggest company for tournaments games but still got the worse community in the world and nothing have been changed for years, it only got even worse then before if i cant enjoy 1 game without players ruin it, 1 single game and believe me i'm trying to help everyone even if i played top, i run to all lanes to help, but still all the games got ruin by trolls.
so 5 games in a row been trolled, jeez whats the point of playing this game anymore ? 
better yet to sell my account with all the skins that i spend money on them back those years of lol.

thx to who ever care to read this post or comment.
